short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: inspeq ai's browser extension helps users inspect the output of their favorite AI app for accuracy and robustness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
inspeq ai's chrome extension revolutionises your interactions with Large Language Model (LLM) based apps. Powered by research backed proprietary framework, this extension equips you with invaluable metrics to inspect the accuracy and robustness of your AI output in real-time.

Whether you're engaging with customer service bots, virtual assistants, or any other AI-driven conversational agents, inspeq ai provides insightful scores to help you make informed decisions. 

Say goodbye to uncertainties in your AI interactions.

How to Use:

1. Add the extension to your browser.
2. Use it on any of the following applications:
   - OpenAI Chat - https://chat.openai.com
   - Perplexity AI - https://www.perplexity.ai
   - Bing Chat - https://www.bing.com/chat

Support:

For assistance, please reach out to us at support@inspeq.ai
